name: Shooting Ball
description:
Shooting Ball is a prototype designed during a 3-day game jam by a single developer (myself) as part of an entrepreneurial journey with the aim of creating a studio. 

My goal is to create a complete game based on this prototype within a few months. 

And YOU can HELP ME with that! All you have to do is play, enjoy and then answer a quick questionnaire which will only take you a few minutes, but which will be invaluable to me in the progress of this project!

Link to the googleform : https://forms.gle/scmjEW3g71vg6eEU7

Shooting Ball is a platform racing game in which you control a ball that you propel in the desired direction with the mouse (or a controller), various bonus boxes will help you overcome obstacles or slow down your opponents. (up to 4 players)
